The naming scheme corresponds to the clustering obtained 
[here](http://docs.neurodata.io/meda/examples/K15_1e4/Raw/SynDataRaw.html#cluster-dendrogram)

The synaptograms in this folder are 15x15x15 splayed out 
horizontally in z.
